name: Binary Revolution Control File
summary: A BRCTR file is a user interface control file for Mario Kart Wii and other Nintendo Wii video games. It uses the data stored in .BRLYT and .BRLAN files to show menus and menu animations to players. Mario Kart Wii's BRCTR files are stored in the game's ctrl directories.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
